attributes.action: urge the Olympic committee to scrap the London 2012 Olympic logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whatever logo is suggested there is always going to be at least one person that does not like it. Therefore a neutral compromise is needed in a new design: 

British Colours i.e. Red, White and Blue
London Landmarks
& The Olympic rings and flame

The new logo is none of these things. It is a fragmented, tasteless, tacky creation that no one likes*

May I suggest a national competition, winning logo picked by the public?

*except Lord Coe & Cronies, possibly 1980’s ‘Tiswas’ fans

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
